ComicInfo.Title: We Can't Rewind We've Gone Too Far
ComicInfo.Summary:
Penny and Marcy wake up somewhere strange, while Valerie and Myles find out the secret behind Marv's potentially disastrous schemeâ€¦ but their attempts to derail his plans prove fruitless. Mike's rage at his former employers boils over (unfortunately, at the wrong person), and Penny's attempt to talk tough with Beverly leads to her getting a lesson in love.
